hero.name: Ayman
hero.description: A FullStack developer passionate about building clean, fast, and impactful digital experiences.

about.description: I am a FullStack Developer with over 4 years of commercial experience, specializing in building modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications. I thrive at the intersection of creativity and functionality, transforming UI/UX designs into seamless digital experiences using React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern frontend and backend technologies, including building APIs, server-side functionality, and automation tools. I excel at crafting cross-browser, semantic layouts with a focus on maintainable and scalable code, while also developing backend solutions that power complex applications and integrations. Beyond coding, I enjoy solving complex problems, optimizing application performance, and creating tools that simplify workflows such as Telegram bots and mini-applications that automate routine processes and enhance user interaction. I am eager to contribute to a forward-thinking team where I can continue advancing in frontend and backend architecture, performance optimization, and engineering excellence while delivering impactful, full-stack digital experiences.

experience.header1: WHAT I HAVE DONE SO FAR

job1.title: Middle Web Developer
job1.about: Media buying agency specializing in purchasing traffic on social networks.

description.point1: Developed and implemented various services and mini-applications in Telegram.
description.point2: Built a Telegram bot in Node.js to automate routine processes, significantly speeding up and simplifying daily workflows.
description.point3: Created and adapted layouts for multiple devices, ensuring full cross-browser compatibility.
description.point4: Developed and integrated APIs to ensure stable web application performance.
description.point5: Fixed defects and technical issues, improving overall user experience.
description.point6: Enhanced form functionality by adding interactive elements and creating an anti-duplicate script.
description.point9: Adapted landing pages and pre-landing pages for Arabic-speaking users.
description.point10: Mentored front-end colleagues on adaptive/RTL layouts and JavaScript optimization.
description.point11: Built a Playwright project for user-agent emulation.
description.point12: Developed a bot using Puppeteer and Node.js for automated form filling and data submission.
description.point13: Created a web application for generating random user data with country and quantity filters

job2.title: Java Developer
job2.about: Specializing in the development of software solutions for businesses, especially in the financial sector. The company's main product is <Remit Flow>, designed for exchange offices and money transfers.

description.point1: Participated in all stages of software development: design, implementation, deployment, and support..
description.point2: Analyzed requirements and contributed to achieving business goals.
description.point3: Developed and maintained Java/Java EE applications with a focus on optimization and scalability.
description.point4: Collaborated with teams to ensure quality and meet deadlines.
description.point5: Coordinated with various departments (analytics, DevOps, support) to ensure smooth system operation and successful solution implementation.
description.point6: Prepared technical documentation and provided user guidance.

job3.title: Technical Support Specialist
job3.about: IT services company. Provides domain registration, hosting, web design and development, and also offers accounting systems and technical support.

description.point1: Troubleshooting and resolving software and hardware issues.
description.point2: Diagnosing and fixing technical problems, including account setup and network configuration.
description.point3: Following up with clients to ensure full functionality of their IT systems after issue resolution.
